com.googlecode.n_orm.storeapi

Class DelegatingStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.n_orm.storeapi.DelegatingStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Store
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CachedStore, WriteRetentionStore

    public class DelegatingStore
extends Object
implements Store
    A store that delegates all of its requests to another one.

      • get

        public Row.ColumnFamilyData get(MetaInformation meta,
                       String table,
                       String id,
                       Set<String> families)
                         throws DatabaseNotReachedException
        Description copied from interface: Store
        Returns all elements in families ; no side-effect. In case element with the given key is missing, null is returned.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Store
        table - the table from which to find the element
        id - the unique identifier (i.e. the key) with which the element was stored
        families - the set of column families to be activated ; should never be null or empty
        Returns:
        the data stored for each family ; null if and only if the id does not exist within the given table
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotReachedException

                  throws DatabaseNotReachedException
        Description copied from interface: Store
        Stores given piece of information. In case an element is missing in the data store (table, row, family, ...), it is created.
